titles: The defence of the nonconformists plea for peace, or, An account of the matter of their nonconformity against Mr. J. Cheney's answer called The conforming nonconformist, and The nonconforming conformist : to which is added the second part in answer to Mr. Cheney's Five undertakings / by Richard Baxter.
author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
notes: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
keywords: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691. --  Nonconformists plea for peace.
J. C. --  (John Cheyney). --  Conforming nonconformist and the nonconforming conformist.
